name: Apple
description: Fresh and crispy red apples, rich in fiber and antioxidants for a healthy snack.

name: Plum
description: Sweet and tangy berries widely used in baking, beverages, and desserts.

name: Black Grape
description: Juicy black grapes with a rich sweet flavor, perfect for snacking or salads.

name: Blackberry
description: Plump and juicy blackberries packed with vitamins and a delicious tart taste.

name: Blueberry
description: Antioxidant-rich blueberries that are great for smoothies, oatmeal, and baking.

name: Cherry
description: Fresh red cherries with a perfect balance of sweetness and tartness.

name: Grapes
description: Refreshing green grapes with a crisp texture and naturally sweet burst of flavor.

name: Guava
description: Tropical guavas with pink flesh, offering a unique sweet and fragrant taste.

name: Kiwi
description: Tangy and sweet kiwis loaded with Vitamin C for a refreshing energy boost.

name: Lemon
description: Zesty yellow lemons perfect for adding a citrus kick to drinks and dishes.

name: Mango
description: The king of fruits, sweet and juicy mangoes with a rich tropical aroma.

name: Orange
description: Juicy citrus oranges packed with immunity-boosting Vitamin C and freshness.

name: Peaches
description: Soft and fuzzy peaches with a succulent sweet flesh and delicate floral scent.

name: Red Berry
description: A mix of wild red berries offering a tart flavor profile for adventurous palates.

name: Strawberry
description: Classic red strawberries known for their bright color and sweet, juicy taste.

name: Tomato
description: Ripe red tomatoes, a kitchen staple essential for salads, sauces, and cooking.

name: Watermelon
description: Hydrating and sweet watermelon, the ultimate refreshing treat for hot days.

name: pomegranate
description: Nutrient-packed pomegranates with ruby-red arils bursting with sweet tart juice.

name: pineapple
description: Tropical pineapples with a golden interior and a perfect mix of sweet and sour.

name: Dragon fruit
description: Exotic dragon fruit with a stunning appearance and a mild, slightly sweet flavor.

name: Papaya
description: Sweet and soft papayas with vibrant orange flesh, rich in digestive enzymes and Vitamin A.

name: Coconut
description: Crisp and juicy pears with a delicate sweetness, perfect for snacking or desserts.

name: Lychee
description: Sweet and aromatic lychees with a juicy translucent flesh, perfect for refreshing summer treats.

name: Apricot
description: Tender apricots with a golden-orange hue and a mildly sweet, slightly tangy taste.
